channel.title: Need help
channel.description:
Okay, I have looked at many tutorials/ other people's help topics.
For some reason when I click on my compiler it shows "System Can Not Find Specific Path etc.
Okay, A quick run through of everything I have done, maybe I have over looked something or forgot something.
In the compiler I have added this
[code]@echo off title servername Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause[/code]
Now, Under my variables I have added this.
CLASSPATH [code] CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin;%CLASSPATH%;[/code]
PATH [code] C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin[/code]
I've done this before, but it has been awhile since I have. So I would say at the moment, I am completely new at this. So if something it out of place or etc. please tell me and help me.
~Thanks.

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @2xbladex2 2xbladex2
item.description:
@2xbladex2 wrote:

classpath

.;C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_03\bin\;C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\lib\ext\QTJava.zip;C:\Program

PATH

C:\Program Files\PHP\;C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_03\bin\;C:\Program Files\QuickTime\QTSystem\;

Compiler

@echo off COLOR 09 title PhoneScape Source "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\javac" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\java" server pause

That will solve all your problems make that compiler your compiler.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @Pilldom Pilldom
item.description:
@Pilldom wrote:

Hum, Im not a expert but I would try going to the file thats in your class path and make sure its there. If its not then there your problem.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @stardude stardude
item.description:
@stardude wrote:

Okay, I have looked at many tutorials/ other people’s help topics.

For some reason when I click on my compiler it shows "System Can Not Find Specific Path etc.

Okay, A quick run through of everything I have done, maybe I have over looked something or forgot something.

In the compiler I have added this

@echo off title servername Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause

Now, Under my variables I have added this.

CLASSPATH

CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin;%CLASSPATH%;

PATH

C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin

I’ve done this before, but it has been awhile since I have. So I would say at the moment, I am completely new at this. So if something it out of place or etc. please tell me and help me.

~Thanks.

Read full topic
